description: 2 women with leaves in their hair (one reclining with eyes closed at left, wearing a scallop-trimmed dress and ballet slippers; the other with skirt of long, semi-transparent cloth covering a vertical railing on which she stands) flank a man wearing a dark cloth tied around his waist, sunglasses and flowers in his hair, reaching up with his PR hand
title: Rites of Spring, Lower East Side, NYC
